text: The 2007 Sha Tin District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 36 elected members to the 46-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:31%;" | 11 | style="background:Grey; width:3%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:67%;" | 24 |- | Pro-democracy | V | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:13.89%;" | 5 | style="background:red; width:86.11%;" | 31 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Sha Tin District Council election
